_source.text: 1.Because it's on a Friday 2.Because it's not on a Monday 3.To have a 3 day weekend 4.There's not enough national holidays 5.Look at all the great people that were born on Friday the thirteenth (Not that I can think of anybody,can you think of anybody ?) 6.So people can go to Ho Chunk and bet all their money away 7.It's better than a poke in the eye 8.To commemorate our thirteenth president Mildred Filmore, don't you remember what he did for our country ?
